revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = Belue |image = [[File:Belue.png]] |caption = This glossy and colorful Berry has a mouthwateringly delicious appearance. However, it is awfully sour. |growtime = 5h 30m 0s |harvest = 20 berries |replant = 10% |points = 1,100 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *30 sour }} '''Belue''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Nomel]] with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of sour and no more than 80 points of all other flavours. The [[Nomel]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour 23 mins 20 secs || 2 hours 43 mins 20 secs || 4 hours 1 min 40 secs || 5 hours 30 mins - 11 hours |- !Animation |

[[File:BelueTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BelueTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
